name: Pitch Perfect
description: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

review.author: M0vieL0ver
review.heading: Fun movie
review.reviewBody: Start watching and the movie hooks you in pretty quickly. Some laugh out loud scenes. Fun stuff. Recommended.

keywords: a cappella,female protagonist,friendship between girls,bechdel test passed,red hair
